strategy.implementations

Class BasicStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • strategy.implementations.BasicStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMastermindStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Knuth, Random, Simple

    public abstract class BasicStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMastermindStrategy
    This abstract class provides methods and fields that are needed for almost every good mastermind strategy and thus decreases code duplication.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicStrategy

        public BasicStrategy(int codeLength)

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public Code reset()
        Reset the state of the strategy and return a good first guess. The reset method should be the same for every good strategy simply because there is not much to it. The only intelligent thing to do is to try a code whose first button is the same as the last pushed button in order to minimize the travel distance for the robot.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface IMastermindStrategy
        Returns:
        First guess

      • getConsistentCodes

        public java.util.List<Code> getConsistentCodes(java.util.List<Code> codes,
                                               Code lastGuess,
                                               Answer answer)
        Filter consistent codes from 'codes'. 'codes' is not changed during this method call. A code is consistent if the answer from comparing 'lastGuess' and a code from 'codes' is the same as the answer from comparing 'lastGuess' and the secret code given by the game.
        Parameters:
        codes - List of codes where consistent codes are filtered
        lastGuess - Last tried guess
        answer - Answer by the game for the last tried guess
        Returns:
        result List of consistent Codes

      • removeInconsistentCodes

        public void removeInconsistentCodes(java.util.List<Code> codes,
                                    Code lastGuess,
                                    Answer answer)
        Remove inconsistent codes from 'codes'. 'codes' is mutated. A code is inconsistent if the answer from comparing 'lastGuess' and a code from 'codes' is not the same as the answer from comparing 'lastGuess' and the secret code given by the game.
        Parameters:
        codes - List of codes where inconsistent codes are removed from
        lastGuess - Last tried guess
        answer - Answer by the game for the last tried guess
